## NestedFlowOperation.afterInsertion() method

Transforms the current operation so that its intent is preserved after the specified range was inserted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
afterInsertion(range: FlowRange): FlowOperation | null;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  range | [FlowRange](./scribing.flowrange.md) |  |
